author: Staff Reporter
text:
Alleging that crores of rupees allocated for various infrastructural schemes in the rural areas by the Central and the State governments were being “swindled” by authorities owing to lack of a system to monitor proper utilisation of funds, a PIL petition sought the Madras High Court to order an investigation monitored by the court.

Petitioner Varaaki alleged that crores of rupees allotted for such projects were being “swindled” by the authorities concerned. Hence, the petitioner wanted the court to order an investigation to look into the issue and initiate appropriate action if the allegations are proved.
title: Plea seeks probe into utilisation of funds for rural development
